author: Morgan Gstalter
title: New York Attorney General launches hotline to report coronavirus hate crimes, xenophobia against Asian Americans
description: New York State Attorney General Letitia James launched a hotline this week for people to report hate crimes and bias-based incidents against Asian Americans during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic....
content:
New York Attorney General Letitia James launched a hotline this week for people to report hate crimes and bias-based incidents against Asian Americans during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
James said in a statement that the COVID-19 outbreak does not give… [+3483 chars]
